message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm making a strong opening!
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'm willing to make a slightly better offer!
You're getting close to desperation, I'm getting closer to my goal!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll make another offer to try to get a better deal!
You're running out of time, I'm running out of patience!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll make one more offer to try to get a better deal!
This is my final offer, take it or walk away!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, let's see if I can get a better deal!
This is my last stand, take it or we both walk away with nothing!
